short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Tic-Tac-Toe against the computer offline.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Tic-Tac-Toe against the computer offline with this simple and fun Chrome extension! Challenge yourself to outsmart the AI, enjoy quick games on the go, and experience classic game-play without needing an internet connection.
